Articles.Content:
KAS has a winch that can launch or "eject" an attached harpoon.

I was wondering if anyone could make a "Harpoon Gun" based on this?

I have tried modifying the cfg file for the winch to get my desired effect, but it isn't working the way I would like.

I would like to be able to launch the harpoon much faster and for a little  longer distance.
